page.title: 18The River Otter at Salterton
page.content: The River Otter is a very quiet place with some enjoyable walks.Only rarely is an{otter}seen .The water is very clear and you can see the fish swimming below.There are few cars around to make a noise. In and around the river there are many kind of animals and other wild life. Sometimes you can see a{tawny owl}up in a tree.On the banks of grass in the saltmarshes are a couple of nests of {mute swans}which have returned here for several years.One of the more common birds you will see is the {herring gull}.There are several {kestrels}that may be seen hovering around,probably after{mice. The fishing is good and the three most common fish are{mullet,pike and trout. Beyond the saltmarsh is the estuary and the sea.
